summary.p: This anthology of Sanskrit verses was edited by Peter Peterson in 1888. This copy was acquired by the Central Archaeological Library in New Delhi in 1956, and it was digitized by the Digital Library of India in 2015.

msItem.title: parallel to the Vahnipurāṇa śiber upākhyāna

listBibl.bibl: Peterson, Peter, ed. 1888. The Paddhati of Sarngadhara. A Sanskrit Anthology. Vol I. The Text. Bombay: Government Central Book Depot.

encodingDesc.p: IAST transliteration. Spaces added where possible.

lg.l: yannimittaṃ bhavec chokas trāso vā duḥkham eva vā |
āyāso vā yatomūlas tad ekāṅgam api tyajet || 42 ||
